name: dbviewer
description: Viewer application that connects to patent DB

scripts.sqlip: docker start sqlserver & docker inspect --format '{{.NetworkSettings.Networks.nat.IPAddress}}' sqlserver
scripts.start: docker start sqlserver && for /f "usebackq delims=" %a in (`docker inspect --format '{{.NetworkSettings.Networks.nat.IPAddress}}' sqlserver`) do @set SQLIP=%a & electron .
scripts.startNext: docker start sqlserver && for /f "usebackq delims=" %a in (`docker inspect --format '{{.NetworkSettings.Networks.nat.IPAddress}}' sqlserver`) do @set SQLIP=%a & set USEDB=NextIdea& electron .
scripts.startUpload: docker start sqlserver && for /f "usebackq delims=" %a in (`docker inspect --format '{{.NetworkSettings.Networks.nat.IPAddress}}' sqlserver`) do @set SQLIP=%a & set USEDB=NextIdea& node ./test/3_insertPatents.js
scripts.getSQLIP: docker start sqlserver && for /f "usebackq delims=" %a in (`docker inspect --format '{{.NetworkSettings.Networks.nat.IPAddress}}' sqlserver`) do @set SQLIP=%a
scripts.testUpdate: docker start sqlserver && for /f "usebackq delims=" %a in (`docker inspect --format '{{.NetworkSettings.Networks.nat.IPAddress}}' sqlserver`) do @set SQLIP=%a && set USEDB=NextIdea && node ./test/5_updatePatents.test.js

author: Bill Farmilo
